abstract: Julius Meinl V was arrested on suspicion of defrauding investors in secretive share buybacks in 2007.
snippet: Julius Meinl V was arrested on suspicion of defrauding investors in secretive share buybacks in 2007.
lead_paragraph: PARIS  Julius Meinl V, the scion of a Viennese business dynasty whose name has been synonymous since the days of the Hapsburgs with luxuries like exotic coffee, handmade tortes and discreet private banking, has been jailed on suspicion of fraud at a company linked to the family.

headline.main: Austrian Bank Scion Is Accused of Fraud
headline.print_headline: Scion of Wealthy Austrian Family Is Accused of Fraud

byline.original: By Nelson D. Schwartz and Julia Werdigier
